name: Check Mate (Final Major Project)
description:
Controls 

Movement:

A = Left
D = Right
Spacebar = Jump
K = Attack 

To start the game. You must click on the 'START' Text. 

All assets, programming and all other sound effects where created by me. 

The background music (A cover of 'Bizet L'Arlésienne Second Suite Farandole') was from Cathrine, which was developed by ATLUS. I own no rights to the music.
